name: Robot Revo
description:
Take over the world with your Neon army of drones! Destroy turrets to destroy shields, destroy shields to destroy the 5 bases around the map, destroy the 5 bases to win.

Control the camera with WASD and scroll to zoom. Click anywhere to move your drone controller to that place, and the drone army will follow.

Roles: 

Juan - Tech artist / Programmer

Elliot: Artist

Sam: Programmer / Audio Designer

Callum: Designer

Gabe: Tech Artist / Programmer

Lewis: Artist
